definition: Varyag, former Soviet aircraft carrier purchased by China and renamed 遼寧號|辽宁号[Liao2 ning2 Hao4]
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Finally, Varyag is clearly China's "starter" carrier.
sentences.chinese: 最後，瓦良格號顯然是中國航母的“啓動器”。

sentences.english: Military analysts caution that the carrier itself is not a game changer.
sentences.chinese: 軍事分析家警告說，瓦良格號本身並未改變遊戲規則。

sentences.english: Above all, Varyag is a symbol of China's rising power.
sentences.chinese: 首先，瓦良格號是中國力量崛起的象徵。

definition: Liaoning, the first aircraft carrier commissioned into the PLA Navy (commissioned in 2012)
